text: I know when they diagnosed me with #Cancer I changed doctors and waited to die ~ My sister died from the treatments ~ I did not have access until 2014 I have been blessed with the #Cannabis extracts since January 2014 it is now September 2019 #ITrustBernie #Bernie2020 will listen https://t.co/sueyxOg6gR https://t.co/v31m2790jk
